EmailInputEdit:
If you need more information about how to do a manual align you can look this article:

https://support.3shape.com/products-unite-software-how-to/how-to-manually-align-bite-scan-in-trios-software?from_search=186000910
Issue: Realign a bite for a case
Solution: Do a manual align to the bite
Step 1: - Select a point on the lower jaw
Step 2: Select another point on the bite scan
Step 3: Do the same with the upper jaw and the bite
Step 5: Ask the customer to confirm that he look it good
Step 6: Successfully post process the case and sent it to the lab
